comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Chilean heiress Blanca Errázuriz en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blanca_Err%C3%A1zuriz married to John L de Saulles www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4525453659/ This is about the time that he was appointed Minister to Uruguay. See NYT of March 11, 1914, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B03E1DD163AE633A... In 1917, after a divorce, she shot him in a dispute over custody of their child.
